question_text: Select two characteristics of a site-to-site VPN:
answer_options: Connects entire local networks using VPN endpoints
Requires a VPN client installed on every workstation
Encrypts all data between remote offices over public networks
Is only available for wireless LANs
correct_answer: Connects entire local networks using VPN endpoints
Encrypts all data between remote offices over public networks
explanation: Site-to-site VPNs link remote offices together securely using VPN appliances or firewalls at each end.
